titleStmt.title: By the Lords Justices of Ireland, a proclamation. Requireing all officers and soldiers to observe strict discipline, and for payment of quarters. Charles Porter, Coningesby. To the end their Majesties forces in this kingdom may be kept in good order and discipline, ...
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lords Justices and Council.
Coningsby, Thomas Coningsby, Earl, 1656?-1729.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andrew Crook, assignee of Benjamin Tooke, printer to the King and Queen's most Excellent Majesties on Ormonde-Key,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening words of text.
"Given at their Majesties castle of Dublin, the 23. day of July, 1692.".
A proclamation. requireing all officers and soldiers to observe strict discipline, and for payment of quarters.--Steele.
Steele notation: Arms 193. may been 2) same No-.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
